modName: Dragon Fight music replace to Skyrim theme
summary:
What the mod does:
it simple replace all the dragon fight themes to skyrim main theme song

to be accurate it use only the \"mus_combat_boss_02\"
descriptionHtml:
What the mod does:
it simple replace all the dragon fight themes to skyrim main theme song

to be accurate it use only the \"mus_combat_boss_02\"


Installation:

just put the files in the skyrim DATA folder
to most users:

C:\\program files\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data


Credits
Special thanks to bethesda 
and jeremy soule

------------------------------------------------------------------------


I have nothing to claim from this i just did it because
people like to play all the dragon fights under this song!!!

------------------------------------------------------------------------

Sorry for my English  

                   Avras
author: AvrasBadem
